WrestlerMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
WrestlerMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

WrestlerMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
WrestlerMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
WrestlerMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

WrestlerMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
WrestlerMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

WrestlerMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
WrestlerMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !WrestlerMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

WrestlerMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
WrestlerMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !WrestlerMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

WrestlerMod:Sharpshooter.NAME: Sharpshooter
WrestlerMod:Sharpshooter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each debuff the enemy has.

WrestlerMod:SquareOff.NAME: Square Off
WrestlerMod:SquareOff.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. If you attack it twice this turn, apply Grappled. NL Gain !B! Block.

WrestlerMod:TakeToTheMat.NAME: Take to the Mat
WrestlerMod:TakeToTheMat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy has !M! % health or less, they become Grappled.
